items.content_html: A lightweight tool that takes your LinkedIn profile link, resume link, or PDF file, and automatically generates a stylish README.md for your GitHub main profile. It includes your bio, key info, favorite quote, and a personalized theme — all previewed live before saving!

It includes your bio, key info, favorite quote, and a personalized theme — all previewed live before saving!
